response.overview: The bride left the main character, Alisher, and he became discouraged because of this. The hapless groom's best friends, Erla and Sanjik, decide to pull him out of his sadness by arranging an unforgettable vacation for him in a picturesque place. In nature, the guys get acquainted with two pretty girls, Carla and Zara, and events suddenly turn into incredible life-threatening adventures. Orla, Alish and their new friend Zara wake up early in the morning before dawn and discover that Karla and Sanjik are missing. And a couple of hours before that, late at night, Dawn received a strange video message, where a frightened Carla does not understand where she got to, Sanjik's voice is also heard. The friends go in search of Karla and Sanjik and end up with sectarians who are ready to sacrifice them for the sake of an ancient deity.
response.title: Kazakh Prank
